Description: On I-95 at mile marker 76.3 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The south center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 156.6 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 157.2 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 62.4 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
